exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params rri : raft_refinement_interface cei : candidate_entries_interface vci : votes_correct_interface cci : cronies_correct_interface olpti : one_leader_per_term_interface net : network Hce : CandidateEntries net Hvc : votes_correct net Hcc : cronies_correct net p : packet h : Net.name e : entry Hin : In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) HinP : In p (nwPackets {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |}) Hbody : pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true Hterm : currentTerm (nwState {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |} (pDst p)) = eTerm e HwonE : wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (nwState {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |} (pDst p)))) = true Unable to unify "CandidateEntries net" with "type (nwState {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let (_, d) := nwState X in d end |} (pDst p)) <> Candidate".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
cei: candidate_entries_interface
vci: votes_correct_interface
cci: cronies_correct_interface
olpti: one_leader_per_term_interface

Goal:
forall net : network, CandidateEntries net -> votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> forall (p : packet) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> CandidateEntriesLowered_rvr (deghost net) e p

Premises:
Record candidate_entries_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_candidate_entries_interface { candidate_entries_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> CandidateEntries net } Arguments candidate_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_candidate_entries_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => one_vote_per_term net /\ votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct net /\ currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
cronies_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => votes_received_cronies net /\ cronies_votes net /\ votes_nw net /\ votes_received_leaders net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record votes_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_votes_correct_interface { votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net } Arguments votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_votes_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in let (_, d) := nwState0 in d end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments deghost {base_params multi_params ghost_params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
CandidateEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => candidateEntries_host_invariant (nwState net) /\ candidateEntries_nw_invariant net : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments CandidateEntries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
CandidateEntriesLowered_rvr = fun (net : network) (e : entry) (p : packet) => In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (nwState net (pDst p)) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (nwState net (pDst p)))) = true -> type (nwState net (pDst p)) <> Candidate : network -> entry -> packet -> Prop
Record cronies_correct_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_cronies_correct_interface { cronies_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> cronies_correct net } Arguments cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_cronies_correct_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record one_leader_per_term_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_one_leader_per_term_interface { one_leader_per_term_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> one_leader_per_term net } Arguments one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_one_leader_per_term_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
candidate_entries_lowered' : forall net : network, CandidateEntries net -> votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h'))) -> CandidateEntriesLowered (deghost net) e h
wonElection_candidateEntries_rvr : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (e : entry), votes_correct net -> cronies_correct net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply (eTerm e) true -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (pSrc p :: votesReceived (snd (nwState net (pDst p))))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) <> Candidate
candidate_entries_lowered : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> forall (h h' : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (nwState net h')) -> CandidateEntriesLowered net e h
leader_sublog_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex) (e : entry), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> In e entries -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) ->...-> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leader_sublog_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (nwState net leader) = Leader -> In e (log (nwState net h)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (nwState net leader) -> In e (log (nwState net leader)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leader_sublog_host_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries : forall (net : network) (h h' : name) (t : nat) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (e : entry), st' = handleRequestVoteReply h (snd (nwState net h)) h' t r -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (update_elections_data_requestVoteReply h h' t r (nwState net h), st'))
candidateEntries_wonElection : forall (net : network) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), one_vote_per_term net -> cronies_votes net -> votes_received_cronies net -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h)))) = true -> type (snd (nwState net h)) <> Candidate
candidateEntries_host_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (sigma : name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => forall (h : name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (sigma h))) -> candidateEntries e sigma : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), (name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) -> Prop Arguments candidateEntries_host_invariant {orig_base_params raft_params} _%function_scope
doLeader_preserves_candidateEntries : forall (net : network) (gd : ghost_data) (d : data) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (e : entry), nwState net h = (gd, d) -> doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) -> candidateEntries e (update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h (gd, d'))
votes_received_cronies = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (crony : name), In crony (votesReceived (snd (nwState net h))) -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader \/ type (snd (nwState net h)) = Candidate -> In crony (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_received_cronies {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
CandidateEntriesLowered = fun (net : network) (e : entry) (h : Net.name) => currentTerm (nwState net h) = eTerm e -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (votesReceived (nwState net h))) = true -> type (nwState net h) <> Candidate : network -> entry -> Net.name -> Prop
candidateEntries_same : forall (st st' : name -> electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry), candidateEntries e st -> (forall h : name, cronies (fst (st' h)) = cronies (fst (st h))) -> (forall h : name, currentTerm (snd (st' h)) = currentTerm (snd (st h))) -> (forall h : name, type (snd (st' h)) = type (snd (st h))) -> candidateEntries e st'
currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n -> In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments currentTerm_votedFor_votes_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)) = t -> votedFor (snd (nwState net h)) = Some n : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments votes_currentTerm_votedFor_correct {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_raft_refinement_interface : (forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet_subset P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_reboot P -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) ->...-> raft_refinement_interface
lift_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net) -> forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)
one_vote_per_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (n n' : name), In (t, n) (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> In (t, n') (votes (fst (nwState net h))) -> n = n' : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments one_vote_per_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
term_was_created = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (t : term) => exists (h : Net.name) (ll : list entry), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> term -> Prop Arguments term_was_created {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
candidateEntries_nw_invariant = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (leaderId : name) (prevLogIndex : logIndex) (prevLogTerm : term) (entries : list entry) (leaderCommit : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t leaderId prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit -> forall e : entry, In e entries -> candidateEntries e (nwState net) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments candidateEntries_nw_invariant {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
refined_raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
lower_prop : forall P : network -> Prop, (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P (deghost net)) -> forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net
won_election_cronies : forall (net : network) (h : Net.name), cronies_correct net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> wonElection (dedup name_eq_dec (cronies (fst (nwState net h)) (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))))) = true
candidate_entries_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> CandidateEntries net
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
votes_correct_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> votes_correct net
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> gd = fst (nwState net (pDst p)) ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

SpecLemmas.doLeader_message_entries : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (e : entry), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e (log st)

raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope

```coq
intros net Hce Hvc Hcc p h e Hin.
unfold CandidateEntriesLowered, deghost in *.
intros HinP Hbody Hterm HwonE.
apply (handleRequestVoteReply_preserves_candidate_entries net h h pBody h' t r st' e); auto.
apply Hce.
